onepart.title: Product Development Process
onepart.context: By developing the EXALEAD ONEPART platform, we support economic development and purchasing innovation across the entire lifecycle, from production-centric product services to new product development and services.

onepart.title: REUSE / REDUCE
onepart.context: Divided into "Reuse" for 3D similar shape search and utilization from an engineer's perspective, and "Reduce" for achieving part commonization and purchase cost reduction through 3D similar shape analysis.

onepart.title: Necessity of Adoption
onepart.context: To address the difficulties in analyzing large amounts of part data and distributed standard information, there is a need for digital purchasing innovation based on data analysis results using machine learning-based shape analysis.

onepart.title: Expected Benefits of Adoption
onepart.context: Identifying parts with commonization potential and linking ERP purchasing information to improve engineering efficiency and reduce costs.
